display_name: PSG Results: Calculated - RDI in non-supine body position (>= 5% desaturation)
description: missing if studies with problems scoring REM/NREM or if studies scored as sleep/wake or REM sleep time is 3
calculation: rdim5pns = 60*(hrop5 + hnrop5 + carop5 + canop5 + oarop5 + oanop5 + marop5 + manrop5)/(remepop+nremepop)
